attributes.action: Together in electric dreams as England's national anthem
attributes.additional_details: Seeing as England does not have a national anthem I propose that Together in Electric Dreams by Philip Oakey and Giorgio Moroder be installed as it Instead of some dirgey funeral march soundalike. You could even add a brass section if you were so inclined

rejection.details: This is a matter for the relevant sporting authority that choose the which anthem is to be played.
